"Task Tray Time": An ice cube tray with compartments for each task, allowing you to organize and prioritize your tasks like a pro.
"Task Tracker": A smartphone app that uses AI to analyze your daily tasks and provide personalized recommendations for completing them more efficiently.
"Task Tray Tutor": A virtual assistant that provides personalized guidance and accountability for completing tasks, using an ice cube tray as a visual reminder of your goals.

"Task Time Machine": An app that allows you to schedule and organize your tasks in a virtual timeline, making it easier to see how much time you have available for each task and avoid feeling overwhelmed.
"Task Tray Treats": A rewards system that provides incentives for completing tasks, using an ice cube tray as a visual reminder of your progress and accomplishments.
